newsitem.title: USA: Earthgrains indicated higher on earnings.
newsitem.headline: Earthgrains indicated higher on earnings.

text.p: Shares of Earthgrains Co were indicated higher Monday morning after the company reported stronger than expected fiscal third quarter earnings.
Earthgrains shares were not trading due to an imbalance, but were bid at 49 and offered at 50-1/2 on the New York Stock Exchange. The stock closed January 24 at 47-3/8.
Natwest analyst David Nelson said the company's third quarter earnings of $0.91 a share beat his estimate for the quarter of $0.72.
It had a pro forma year-ago loss of $0.91 a share.
"It reflects the pricing power that the company has had," Nelson said of the third quarter results.
Earthgrains is the third-largest producer of fresh baked goods and the second-largest producer of refrigerated dough products in the United States.
